Biomes.Name: Biome template
Biomes.Description: This is a example template, it demonstrates how to create biomes
Encounterable enemies: A list of standard enemies that can be encountered in this biome. Other factors may apply encounterability
Unique Encounters: A list of unique events that can happen in this biome
Bosses: A list containing, the boss or bosses of a given biome
Unique Rewards: A list of rewards that can only be found in this biome

Biomes.Name: Cubicle Farm
Biomes.Description: An endless sea of cubicles where boring people live out their boring lives

Biomes.Name: Leisure Area
Biomes.Description: A terrible place filled with that demonstrates the worst of corporate excess

Biomes.Name: IT
Biomes.Description: It's like a zombie movie, except instead of groans and grunts, you hear mindless drones endlessly repeating the phrase 'reinvent the wheel'

Biomes.Name: HR
Biomes.Description: A den of cackling harpies that wield their power with impunity
